name: Gomoku HD - 5 in a row
description:
Gomoku is a simple yet challenging games that requires focus and strategy. Alternate placing a stone of your color on an empty intersection. Your goal is to create a continuous horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row of stones of your color (white or black). Whoever creates a row first is the winner. CHoose your difficulty level and start playing now!

We value feedback, so please leave your reviews in the AppStore or contact us directly at games@greyheadstudio.com for suggestions or comments :)
